questions.question: What is the purpose of Amazon SageMaker Inference Recommender?
options: To train machine learning models more efficiently
To develop new machine learning algorithms
To optimize the performance and cost of deploying machine learning models for inference
To visualize and interpret machine learning models
correct_answers: To optimize the performance and cost of deploying machine learning models for inference
questions.topic: 4.2 Monitor and Optimize Infrastructure and Costs
